name: Optiver
goal: Optiver is a global electronic market maker, focusing on pricing, execution and risk management. We provide liquidity to financial markets using our own capital, at our own risk, trading a wide range of products, such as listed derivatives, cash equities, ETFs, bonds and foreign currencies.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: Financial sector regulation such as MiFID II, CRD IV, MAD/MAR, EMIR, FTT, CCP Recovery & Resolution.
